title: Low prio queue is a joke.
body:
Dc mid game because my router decides to restart itself for no reason.

Come back get 5 low prio queues at 20 minutes a pop.

Thats nearly 2 hours of low prio.

Ontop of the already abysmal queue times this is gonna take me nearly two days to clear the low prios.

Bit harsh for one fucking game of dc isnt it.

especially when its not even my fucking fault.

replies.body:
> Fuck them they already gave us money.

Riot gave you money?
> Well congrats riot, your fucking low prio queue sent me into a fucking rage induced tilt and i got fucking demoted again.

Congrats on Bronze 4.
>Give the fucking trolls what the fucking want.

You're in low bronze, wtf do you expect?
> 10/10 your systems make the community better, confirmed 2016 kappa /sarcasm.

You tell me a better system.

shitpost/10

Was quoting riots attitude "fuck our customers we already have their money"

I got demoted to b5 from b4, b5 is a rage inducing tumor that i wouldnt wish on my worst enemy.

I expect the trolls to get banned so that low bronze isnt full of them.

Tribunal system.

Did i get everything?
I actually kind of like low priority queue. It gives me the chance to watch an episode of bobs burgers or something similar while I wait.

Yea, this is what i do if i get low que timer, i just go to youtube, but i understand where this person is coming from, a single dc because his/her router was getting shit on causing itself to restart to then place you in low que is unfair, i do think thats a joke

Well congrats riot, your fucking low prio queue sent me into a fucking rage induced tilt and i got fucking demoted again.

The vicious fucking cycle continues.

Punish the victim.

make them rage.

Give the fucking trolls what the fucking want.

Oh they just so happen to be on the unforunately short end of the stick with an internet issue.

Fuck them they already gave us money.

Legit you want to fix toxicity, fix your fucking punishment system.

becuase i can tell yo uright now, ive never wanted to fucking punch a kayle player in the face more than i have right at this moment.

And if i didnt get this fucking low prio, i woudlnt want to, becuase i fucking pissed off.

10/10 your systems make the community better, confirmed 2016 kappa /sarcasm.
